data.title: XINGTAI FOUND TOOLS CO., LTD 邢台方工钢锉有限公司
data.text:
Established in 1995, XINGTAI FOUND TOOLS CO., LTD is an enterprise

specialized in the production of Carbide Burrs, Endmill and Steel Files. It is located in

Nanhe County, north China's Hebei Province, where the history of manufacturing steel files has been more than ten decades. With thirty-year development, our plant covers

20,000m2 and is pocessed with 180 staffs including 20 technicians. The annual output

is 10 million pieces, and all products are in compliance with the GB/T5806-2003

National Standard. We passed the ISO 9001 Certificate smoothly in 2008.

Advanced production technology and perfect inspection equipments are helpful

for the technicians to develop and research the high quality products. Our products

are very popular all around the world.

Wth "good quality, excellent credit and considerate service" as the service aim,

the plant enjoys great popularity among the clients all over the world. We would like

to cooperate with all the clients and join hands to create a promising future!
